creator: beetle.kevertje+apache@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 29193
Source SVG

Hi,

I'm using Batik to export fusioncharts graphs to PDF files. These graphs use a gradient to fill the bars. 

When exporting to PDF, these charts are nearly illegible because the bars become almost transparent. Exporting to JPEG or PNG works correctly.

I've attached some demo SVG code as well as the results in PDG and PNG.

These files have been generated using today's dev snapshot.
